faqs.question: How does MicroD√©fis work?
faqs.answer: You get one daily challenge, complete it, then validate it to keep your streak.

faqs.question: How do I change my challenge preferences?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings and select your preferred categories and levels.

faqs.question: How do I enable notifications?
faqs.answer: In Settings, enable notifications and pick your reminder time.

faqs.question: I don't receive notifications, what should I do?
